name: Michael Erdmann's Respositories
body:
# Introduction
I am using this page to state a few word on my public repository. For more information please 
visit my home page [http://www.michaelslab.net](http://www.michaelslab.net).

## Collaboration
The [collaboration](https://github.com/merdmann/Collaboration) project provides a small frame work which enables you to apply your multiple core CPU's to partitionable tasks. A partition is a subset of your input data which can be processed from other partitions. Therefor by applying multiple CPU's in parallel processing independent partitions a speed up of processing time can be achieved.  

Some examples can be found [here](http://www.michaelslab.net/software/computing/index.html)

## bb-examples
This [repository](https://github.com/merdmann/bbb-examples) contains application examples for the beagle bone boards.

## Huygens
The objective of this [project](https://github.com/merdmann/Huygens) was to find a reasonable tool set for presenting data graphically. During the cause of this project id some experiments with such tools. The results is being shown on the [project page](http://www.michaelslab.net/ci.php/huygens)   

## psim2.X
This is the initial test version of the Collaboration packages. It contains quite a lot of experimental code. After performing quite a few measurements only the fastest options have been implemented in the collaboation package.

## Other Stuff
If you are curious about other things i am doing either subscribe my blog: 
[http://michaelslab-diary.blogspot.de/](http://michaelslab-diary.blogspot.de/) or go to my home page
[www.michaelslab.net](http://www.michaelslab.net).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
